item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Viktor has reached his final form not only on Arcane but also on the Rift! Discover it on December 12th along with our second Wild Pass of the patch!
🤖 Viktor 🕹️ Secret Boss Viktor 👩‍❤️‍👨 Elderwood Xayah
